document_data.name: Aghazstamn
document_data.mainbody: '''Aghazstamn''' was a [[blue dragon]] [[dracolich]]. He was a member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] and an acquaintance of [[Symgharyl Maruel]].
document_data.History: In [[1357 DR]], [[Symgharyl Maruel]], having trouble dealing with the ''[[spellfire]]'' of [[Shandril Shessair]], enlisted the help of Aghazstamn, promising him part of the treasure of [[Rauglothgor]]. She rode the blue dracolich into battle but Aghazstamn was destroyed by [[Elminster]], through a reflected ''meteor swarm'', together with her when she tried to slay the group with the spell.
